STATE v. LAWRENCE. No. COA03-1038-2. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed October 3, 2006 Certification Date October 23, 2006. Appeal from Nash (01CRS9508, 01CRS9509, 01CRS9510, 01CRS9511, 01CRS9512, 01CRS9513, 01CRS9514, 01CRS9515, 01CRS9516, 01CRS9517, 01CRS9518, 01CRS9520, 01CRS51630, 01CRS51631)

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
